backend/main.mo: Defines data types and map stores for investment plans, AI insights, leads, deposit requests, and access control, with query and update functions for retrieval and submission.
feature_evidence.json: Describes a feature update linking specific frontend files to a button-triggered sign-in flow and dashboard navigation, with metadata for components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of various frontend components, hooks, and pages for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles with custom CSS variables for a dark red/black theme.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading fonts, metadata, favicon, and mounting the React app in dark mode.
frontend/public/favicon.svg: SVG favicon featuring a geometric red-accented logo inside a rounded black square.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React Query client and renders the application router.
frontend/src/components/auth/InternetIde: Dialog component handling Internet Identity login and user registration with success, error, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Dashboard header with logo, profile navigation, and a sign-out flow that clears auth and cached data.
frontend/src/components/insights/AIInsig: Displays AI-generated market insights with loading, error, and styled insight cards, including impact and time-horizon color coding.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileI: Reusable inline-edit field allowing validation and async save with error handling and edit/cancel controls.
frontend/src/components/site/AnalyticsPr: Shows animated mock analytics data, metrics cards, and a performance chart preview with an illustrative-data disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactSect: Implements a contact form with validation, lead submission, and optional lead list display.
Renders a FAQ list using an accordion with predefined questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/site/FeaturesSec: Displays a grid of feature cards highlighting AI capabilities, performance, security, and analytics features.
frontend/src/components/site/HeroSection: Landing hero with background visuals, marketing text, stats, and CTA buttons for sign‑in and scrolling to insights.
frontend/src/components/site/PricingSect: Displays investment plans with loading states, risk indicators, and triggers sign‑in or an investment dialog.
Footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and a disclaimer plus smooth‑scroll behavior.
Header with logo, navigation, sign‑in/dashboard CTAs, and a mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/site/StartInvest: Multi‑step dialog guiding users through confirming, entering, reviewing, and purchasing an investment plan.
frontend/src/components/wallet/WalletTra: Lists crypto wallet transfer methods and allows copying addresses with visual feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
Provides admin hooks for checking admin status and mutating user wallet balances via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAIInsights.ts: React Query hook that fetches AI insights from the backend actor when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useDepositEligibility: Queries whether the authenticated user is eligible to make a deposit.
Handles authenticated file-based deposit submissions with optional upload progress.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureRegisteredUs: Ensures the authenticated user is registered in the backend by calling registration once per session.
Sets a 15‑minute inactivity timer on non-exempt routes and triggers a callback after timeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and stored identities via a React provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useInvestmentPlans.ts: Fetches available investment plans from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeads.ts: Fetches leads from the backend when enabled and an actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeadSubmission.ts: Submits lead information to the backend and invalidates cached lead data.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides hooks for retrieving and updating the caller's user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegisterUserNumber: Registers a user's unique number and invalidates related eligibility queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUniqueNumber.ts: Fetches the caller's assigned unique number, returning null if unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useWallet.ts: Provides wallet balance and weekly return queries plus mutations for purchases and wallet initialization.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, and utility classes including accessibility and visual effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminWalletCreditPage: Admin interface for crediting or setting wallet balances by principal or email with validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user dashboard with profile greeting, wallet stats, weekly returns, and admin access check.
frontend/src/pages/InvestmentPlansPage.t: Shows investment plan pricing and navigation using site header, footer, and pricing section components.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero, features, AI insights, plans CTA, FAQ, and contact sections.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Profile page allowing viewing and inline editing of user info with validation and save mutations.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Wallet management page handling balance display, deposit workflow, registration steps, and file upload for deposit proofs.
frontend/src/router/AppRouter.tsx: Main hash-based router handling navigation, protected routes, sign‑in flow, and post-login intent redirection.
frontend/src/router/ProtectedDashboardRo: Wrapper that checks authentication and registration state before rendering protected pages or showing a sign‑in prompt.
frontend/src/router/useHashRoute.ts: Custom hook providing simple hash-based routing with route parsing and navigation helpers.
frontend/src/utils/availableBalance.ts: Utility for formatting numeric balances as USD strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across regular and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, features, requests, and architectural notes.
